features: 🌈 72% NTSC Portable Laptop Monitor: Revolutionize your mobile workspace with our 15.6" Full HD 1920*1080 IPS screen portable monitor. Enjoy stunning visuals with HDR, Freesync, and Low Blue Light function. The 72% NTSC 100% sRGB color gamut and 300 cd/m² brightness ensure vibrant and clear images. With a 16:9 aspect ratio, 1000:1 contrast ratio, wide 178° viewing angle, and built-in dual speakers, immerse yourself in your favorite content on-the-go.

🌈 Plug and Play External Monitor: WUAWE portable screen just got even more convenient with plug-and-play functionality. Simply connect to power and display signal transmission using a USB Type-C cable - no drivers needed. With 2 full-featured Type-C ports and a mini HDMI port, easily connect to your laptop💻, PC🖥️, cell phone📱, Macbook, PS5/PS4🎮, Xbox, and Switch for seamless connectivity on-the-go. (⚡Note: Thunderbolt 3.0 or USB 3.1 Type C DP ALT-MODE required for compatibility)

🌈 Multiple Display Mode: This portable display allows you to customize your workspace to meet your needs with multiple display modes, including duplicate, extended, second screen, and vertical display. Plus, with a VESA mount on the back, you can easily attach it to a VESA stand and optimize your workflow. Whether you're a creative professional, gamer, or on-the-go worker, our mobile monitor for laptop is the perfect solution for maximizing your efficiency and getting more done in less time.

🌈 Magnetic Protective Cover: Our portable external monitor comes with a magnetic protective cover, made from high-quality PU material, it not only provides superior protection for the portable computer monitor, but also as a convenient stand with multiple adjustable angles. Whether you're working on the go or setting up a temporary workspace, our durable magnetic cover is the perfect accessory to keep your second monitor safe and stable while you work.

🌈 Slim and Lightweight: Look no further than our ultra-sleek laptop screen extender! With a slim, lightweight design and a durable metal shell, this laptop extended monitor is only 1.53 pounds and 0.4 inches thick, it's the perfect size for packing in your bag and taking with you wherever you go. Plus, with our 24/7 customer service and 12-month warranty, you can rest assured knowing that you're getting the best of the best. Say goodbye to a bulky, cumbersome portable view!

What is each cable used for in the package? 1. USB C to USB A cable: supply power. 2. USB C to USB C cable: power & video signal. (Please make sure your laptop has full-featured Type C port） 3.Mini HDMI to HDMI cable: video signal. (please use USB C to USB A cable to power up the monitor) How to connect the second monitor with my iPhone? For iPhone15 series or android phones: You can directly connect it with usb c cable. For iPhone14 or earlier versions: You need a lightning to HDMI adapter. (not included) Why it doesn't work when I connect the portable monitor with my devices? Black screen or no signal? 1. Pls use the original cables and charger we provide. 2. Pls make sure the USB-C port on your laptop is a Thunderbolt 3/4 port or supports display. 3. Laptops without full-featured Type-C port need connected via HDMI & USB C to USB A cable. What should I do if my portable monitor flickers? 1. Please make sure you’re powering the portable monitor by the original wall charger and cable we provided in the package. 2. Some phones may not be able to provide enough power supply for the monitor, please supply the power. Will any USB C to USB C cables work with this IPS portable screen? The USB C to USB C cable should be the USB C 3.1/4 Version, which supports video output. Or the usb c monitor will fail to be connected.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars excellent addition to toolkit
reviews.reviewText: I'd been eyeing a portable monitor for a while to add to my on-site toolkit. It's elevated the work I can do when I am visiting tech clients.Picture is great, monitor is lightweight and packs easy. Interface connects without issue. I can't speak to any kind of gaming performance, but for websites, Windows, and streaming video, it's excellent.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Might be a budget screen but it’s nice!
reviews.reviewText: The product has great color and I clear picture. The size is great and easy to manage but also easy to see your screen. Super easy set up. I use it with myLaptop for work since I need 2-3 monitors and it’s a nice space saving option but also easy to move around if I need to take work with me. Lightweight, doesn’t weight down my monitor mount/holder. Don’t let the lower price scare you it’s definitely a great product and an awesome price point!

reviews.reviewerName: kaylee and Kyle stantonkaylee and Kyle stanton
reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I had no trouble setting up and I am not a big tech savy person. Didn't need much instructions to get it started. Works well with my nintendo switch as well as my android phone. Amazing quality screen.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Mostly good, but slow even without full memory
reviews.reviewText: I was using this to play my xbox and ps5 remotely and it worked very well for the first month or so. I purposely have not used this tablet for any other purposes to keep the memory clear of unnecessary garbage. Yet after a month or so it has started freezing and take a very long time for the initial boot after waking the device.I recommend spending a little bit more money to get something faster if you want to do anything more than use it for socials.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 25, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Was nervous because I couldn’t get it to work with my 2018 MacBook but I was running Mojave and that seemed to be a common issue for external monitors when searching. After updating Sonoma it works like a breeze! Only have to use one c to c cord for it to work which is an added plus! Would purchase this again if needed. Great monitor for the price

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewText: My daughters job changed to being mobile in the building. She loves this monitor. Folds up easy, sets up fast, simple to hookup to phone or Surface Pro. Light weight. Making work life better!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Está bien para conectar al PC, pero no con el celular no reproduce, escribí al servicio al cliente si me pueden ayudar y no conseguí respuesta

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Very impressed with this monitor. I like being able to switch from landscape to portrait. Connectivity is easy. A definite plus to my work station.
